title: Smart Food
description: An iOS mobile app allowing users to manage food in their fridge. Users can view, add, edit, and delete food item, and enable/disable expiry notification.

title: Library
description: An iOS app to view, add, update, and delete books from a library. The app is integrated MongoDB with a Node.js REST API and deployed on Render. It manages data from both local MongoDB compass and MongoDB Atlas cloud.

title: Roll A Ball
description: A 3D game to control a ball wtih mouse or kwyboard on a scene. Developed with Unity & C#.
